articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: In 3.5 years, Notepad.exe has gone from “barely maintained” to “it writes for you” - Ars Technica
articles.description: AI features in Windows are gradually becoming more widespread and inescapable.

articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: Klarna CEO and Sutter Hill take victory lap after Jony Ive’s OpenAI deal - TechCrunch
articles.description: Hours after Sam Altman and Jony Ive announced on Wednesday that OpenAI was buying Ive’s company, io, in an all-stock transaction valued at $6.5 billion, Investors were happy about the hefty returns they got from the sale of io to OpenAI.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: A safety institute advised against releasing an early version of Anthropic's Claude Opus 4 AI model - TechCrunch
articles.description: A third-party research institute Anthropic partnered with to test Claude Opus 4 recommended against deploying an early version because it tends to "scheme."
